thread.title: Joseph Jones, J.P. Prince Stranded by President Donald Trump's Immigration Ban
thread.title_full: Joseph Jones, J.P. Prince Stranded by President Donald Trump's Immigration Ban

author: Scott Polacek
title: Joseph Jones, J.P. Prince Stranded by President Donald Trump's Immigration Ban
text: Joseph Jones, J.P. Prince Stranded by President Donald Trump's Immigration Ban Joe Robbins/Getty Images Scott Polacek Featured Columnist January 29, 2017 American basketball players Joseph Jones and J.P. Prince are reportedly stranded overseas as part of the fallout from United States President Donald Trump's controversial immigration ban. Jones and Prince play professionally in Iran but are stranded in Dubai after the country banned U.S. citizens in retaliation to Trump's executive order "barring refugees and citizens from seven Muslim-majority countries—including Iran—from entering the United States," per Chris Mannix of The Vertical. More to follow.
